description:
When it comes to Canadian winter, flannel is a staple. It keeps you warm, it's a versatile mid-layer. Brushed on both sides for extra softness, the polyester (you thought it was cotton, didn't you?) wicks moisture and dries fast. Be comfortable in your element, doing chores, or heading out in the backcountry.

  • Made from soft, brushed polyester
  • 2 buttoned chest flaps, because they're classic flannel design features
  • Curved hem for a better fit over jeans
  • Back length from neck to hem is 28.5in
  • UPF 50+ blocks more than 98% of harsh UV
name: Outdoor Research Feedback Flannel Twill Shirt - Women's
